column1: '''Foreword to ''A New Glossary of the Dialect of the Huddersfield District''''' refers to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s Foreword to Walter Heigh's ''[[A New Glossary of the Dialect of the Huddersfield District]]'' ([[1928]]).

column2: Tolkien discusses the compilation of glossaries and the development of the English language in [[Wikipedia:Northern England|Northern England]].<ref name=TB>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=13340|articlename=New Glossary of the Dialect of the Huddersfield District. 1928|dated=|website=TB|accessed=1 January 2012}}</ref>
Author of ''A New Glossary of the Huddersfield Dialect''"
